trans-unit.source: Represents an extension added to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class specifies that the data transmission will use the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding"></xref> class.
Gets the URI for the standard protocol specifying HTTP transmission of SOAP data.
This field is constant.
The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http/".
Gets the URI for the XML namespace of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding"></xref> class.
This field is constant.
The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/".
Gets the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that represents the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
Specifies the type of SOAP binding used by the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle"></xref> values.
The default is `Document`.
Gets or sets the URI with the specification for HTTP transmission of SOAP data.
This required property value will generally be the same as that of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.HttpTransport> field.
However, this property value can be any URI for data-transmission specifications, for example, SMTP or FTP.
A string value representing the URI for the specification for data transmission by means of SOAP.
The default is an empty string ("").
